content:
Yes, there are several street art tours available in Melbourne that can guide you through the city's vibrant art scene. Here are a few options:

1) Melbourne Street Art Tours – this company offers guided tours of Melbourne's most famous street art locations, as well as some off-the-beaten-path spots.

2) Blender Studios – a collective of street artists and creatives, Blender Studios offers tours and workshops that give visitors a behind-the-scenes look at Melbourne's bustling street art scene.

3) Walk Melbourne – this company offers a variety of walking tours around the city, including a popular street art tour that takes in some of Melbourne's most iconic murals and graffiti artworks.

4) Hidden Secrets Tours – while not strictly a street art tour, Hidden Secrets offers a "Street Art and Culture tour" that includes visits to some of the city's most exciting street art locations, as well as insights into the culture and history behind each piece.

Hope this helps, and enjoy your street art adventures in Melbourne!
